A toothbrush that plays music: The toothbrush would have a built-in speaker and microphone, allowing it to play music while you brush your teeth. This would make brushing teeth a more enjoyable experience and help you relax while doing so. The toothbrush could also have a Bluetooth connection, allowing you to connect it to your phone and play your favorite music or podcasts.

A toothbrush that uses AI to personalize brushing: This toothbrush would use artificial intelligence to analyze your brushing technique and provide personalized feedback and recommendations. It could also track your brushing habits and provide insights into your oral hygiene, helping you to improve your brushing technique and maintain better oral health.

A toothbrush that sanitizes itself: This toothbrush would have a built-in UV light that sanitizes the brush head after each use. This would help to reduce the risk of bacterial growth and keep your toothbrush clean and hygienic. The UV light could also be used to sanitize the toothbrush handle, providing an additional layer of cleanliness.

A toothbrush that helps you floss: This toothbrush would have a built-in flossing tool, allowing you to clean between your teeth while brushing. This would help to remove food particles and plaque, reducing the risk of cavities and gum disease. The toothbrush could also have a built-in timer, helping you to floss for the recommended 2 minutes.

A toothbrush that provides personalized oral health recommendations: This toothbrush would use sensors and AI to monitor your oral health and provide personalized recommendations for improving it. It could track your brushing technique, identify areas where you may be neglecting your teeth, and provide suggestions for improving your oral hygiene. The toothbrush could also connect to a mobile app, allowing you to track your progress and receive personalized recommendations for maintaining good oral health.
